# cws-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description                                                                        | Type                                     | Default     |
| ----------- | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `autofocus` | `autofocus` | Autofocus state                                                                    | `boolean`                                | `false`     |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`  | Disabled state, not applicable if the component receive the `href` prop            | `boolean`                                | `false`     |
| `href`      | `href`      | href to redirect user. It render an anchor tag (`<a></a>`) instead of a button one | `string`                                 | `undefined` |
| `size`      | `size`      | Button size                                                                        | `"inside-field" \| "lg" \| "md" \| "sm"` | `'md'`      |
| `type`      | `type`      | Button type, not applicable if the component receive `href` prop                   | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`        | `'button'`  |
| `variant`   | `variant`   | Button style                                                                       | `"primary" \| "secondary"`               | `'primary'` |
